system.story: Your mastery of elemental power lets you customize your conjurations.

effect.before:
Choose one of the following effects:

  • You use the @UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.abilities.emug9cXuwndDrWzu]{Knockback} maneuver, but its distance becomes the range of your Hurl Element ability, and you use Reason instead of Might for the power roll.

  • You choose a creature within the distance of your Hurl Element ability and one of the following damage types: acid, cold, corrup tion, fire, lightning, poison, or sonic. That creature takes damage of the chosen type equal to your Reason score.

  • You teleport up to a number of squares equal to your Reason score. If you choose this option, you can spend essence to teleport 1 additional square for each essence spent.
